lines.text: My dog hunts. He hunts eggs.
If all the men that were shot with unloaded guns was laid end to end, thed' stretch from here to Nashville. I guantee you one thing, they wouldn't get up again.
What's Old Willie asking for boot?
Mustard Greens. Then he talked my Ma into cookin' 'em for him. She says that man is so lazy he wouldn't pick the flies outta strawberry preserves.
